tweak.tweakDescription: This tweak allows you to crack any app on iOS11-12. This works on Electra (iOS 11 only) and Unc0ver jailbreaks. You can remove WatchKit and remove UISupportedDevices from the info.plist in settings.
tweak.tweakChangelog: • Updating to 1.1.5 • Option to Decrypt Binary only • Compatible with iOS 12 (unc0ver only until Electra12 drops) • Minor Fixes
